00:00 New Simpsons Movie 20 Years After Part 1
The most popular family in film and TV history is finally returning! After a 20-year hiatus, Disney is bringing a sequel to "The Simpsons Movie" to theaters. The release date is set for July 23, 2027.

01:43 Margot Robbie in Pirates of the Caribbean
From "Barbie" to the new "Pirates of the Caribbean": Margot Robbie is now confirmed to be part of the next pirate sequel after all!
